TextLibrary.Text: What is this place? It looks as if they were attacked. Pirates, perhaps?
What is this place? It looks as if they were attacked. Pirates, perhaps?
It is one of our research laboratories.
It is one of our research laboratories.
I have no idea. We should split up and search; we'll cover more ground that way.
I have no idea. We should split up and search; we'll cover more ground that way.
What a mess. There's stuff broken everywhere.
What a mess. There's stuff broken everywhere.
People shot... running away from something... they look like they were terrified...
People shot... running away from something... they look like they were terrified...
Hmmm... I don't think they were attacked by Pirates... It looks like something broke OUT of here...
Hmmm... I don't think they were attacked by Pirates... It looks like something broke OUT of here...
I've located the distress beacon. It's coming from an escape pod over near Gemini I.
I've located the distress beacon. It's coming from an escape pod over near Gemini I.
